body:
No particular reasons now that the new arg is inserted to correct place instead of appended. Previously it was appended after a bunch out output args was added, which made understanding this code difficult for me.

I guess one benefit of moving this up is that now the code is more readable as it first constructs the input arg before adding the output args.
